attributes.action: Change the age of consent to protect those at 16 being groomed
attributes.additional_details: It is wrong that a 16 year old can be exploited and have a sexual relationship with a 30+ year old who has manipulated by someone. We deem a 16 year old not mature enough to drink alcohol but old enough to not be groomed.
attributes.background: Change the age of consent from 16 to 18z it can be decriminalised from 16-18 if with someone from an appropriate age, but not with someone who is older and in a position to be exploite.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

It's unclear what you mean by 'someone from an appropriate age'.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you mean.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Raise the age of consent for sex from 16 to 18:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644226
